requirements_en.minimum: iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad Air Cellular, iPad Mini Retina, iPad Mini Retina Cellular, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad Air 2, iPad Air 2 Cellular, iPad Mini 3, iPad Mini 3 Cellular, iPod Touch Sixth Gen, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPad Mini 4, iPad Mini 4 Cellular, iPad Pro, iPad Pro Cellular, iPad Pro 9.7, iPad Pro 9.7 Cellular, iPhone SE, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPad 6 1 1, iPad 6 1 2, iPad 7 1, iPad 7 2, iPad 7 3, iPad 7 4, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPad 7 5, iPad 7 6, iPhone X S, iPhone X S Max, iPhone X R, iPad 8 1 2, iPad 8 3 4, iPad 8 5 6, iPad 8 7 8, iPad Mini 5, iPad Mini 5 Cellular, iPad Air 3, iPad Air 3 Cellular, iPod Touch Seventh Gen

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Athlon™ X2 2.8 GHz, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, 1GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core Processor or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, 1GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 280X series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

results.name: 東方逆妙乱 ~ Ephemeral Unnatural Balance

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 or above
  • Processor: Pentium Dual Core or above
  • Memory: 1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX Compatible Onboard Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible

Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7\8\10
  • Processor: 1.4
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1000 Mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 SB

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: The game could probably run on a toaster, but it's recommended that you run it on a computer just to be safe :)
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Any decent computer will work fine. It will probably even run on your dad's computer.
